empty.title: Commitments & subscriptions
empty.text: Sign up for IBM Cloud Pay as you go with Committed Use
empty.caption: When you commit to spend a certain amount on IBM Cloud, you receive discounts across the platform. You are billed monthly based on your usage, and you continue to get a discount even after you reach your commitment amount.

unauthorized.text: Looks like you don't have access to view commitment and subscription information
unauthorized.caption: Contact your administrator for access.

error.text: Unable to retrieve commitment and subscription data

enterprise.text: This account is managed by an enterprise
enterprise.caption: If you're a member of the enterprise, switch to the enterprise account for more information.

noUpcoming.text: Looks like you don't have an active commitment
noUpcoming.caption: Sign up for a commitment today and save.
